cd4fccfc-23d8-43fb-ab15-98d24ca23a0e: All weapons in a huge area gain additional effects: Allies' Weapons: {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced by half for Tech-Priest's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Enemies suffer a −(2 × INT bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for (1 + INT bonus) rounds. Enemies' Weapons: recoil is increased by half for Tech-Priest's INT bonus rounds. Allies gain +(2 × INT bonus)% increased dodge for (1 + INT bonus) rounds.
fce3091c-e35e-46d1-bf96-a3663a6c3dee: An additional servo-skull connected directly to the Tech-Priest's systems increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by +10.
d9667a6e-cf5b-4b08-9751-3933ad778b13: Ballistic mechadendrites allow the Tech-Priest to use any {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon hands-free.
803fffb7-7aaf-4155-937d-d5a647901585: Grants a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} with Omnissian axes.
36c9fa90-1db3-48df-af9d-d7af114ffaee: This mechadendrite is equipped with all kinds of tools to communicate with machine spirits. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} by +10.
